Wetter module¶

class Wetter.Wetter(verbose, topol, theta=104.5, MOBondlength=2.2, HOHBondlength=1, OHBondlength=1)[source]¶

Methods

calculate_pair_vectors(coordination, O_frac, OH_frac, OH2_frac, center)[source]¶

Calculate coordinates for solvate on for 4-coordinated atoms

Returns:

vectors : ndarray(float)

Directional vectors for each solvate

coord : ndarray(float)

Coordinates for oxygen atom in each solvate

centers : ndarray(int)

List of each center that each solvate belongs to

Notes

Calculates the sum of vectors from oxygen to 4-coordinated metal atoms. These vectors are used as first guesses of the positions for the hydration molecules.

calculate_vectors(coordination, O_frac, OH_frac, OH2_frac, center)[source]¶

Calculate coordinates for solvate on for 5-coordinated atoms

Notes

See calculate_pair_vectors

get_center_neighbours(coordination, center)[source]¶

Construct neighbourgraph where columns are metal centers and rows their coordination shell

Parameters:

coordination : int

The coordination for which to construct the neighbourgraph and the indices for all such metal centers
Returns:

centerIndices

Indices for all metal centers if there are any, otherwise empty

neighbourgrap

neighbourgraph if any atoms found, empty otherwise
maximize_distance()[source]¶

Maximize distance between solvate and it’s neighbours

Notes

Collects all coordinates and calls optimize()

optimize(coords, centers)[source]¶

Set up for minimization scheme for the L-BFGS-B algorithm

Parameters:

coords : 3*N array(float)

The coordination for which to construct the neighbourgraph and the indices for all such metal centers

centers : array(int)

Array containing all the centers which has bound each solvate
Returns:

coords

Optimized oxygen coordinates

vectors

Optimized M-O vectors
Raises:

ValueError

If one or more coordinates are missing centers
solvate(params)[source]¶

Calculates coordinates of solvate for specified metal center type

Parameters:

params : dict

dict with keys: element : string

Element symbol

coordination : int

coordination number of element

OH_frac : float

fraction of element atoms that should be hydrated with hydroxyl.

OH2_frac : float

fraction of element atoms that should be hydrated with water.

Nmax : int

Maximum coordination number
Returns:

vectors : ndarray(float)

Directional vectors for each solvate

coord : ndarray(float)

Coordinates for oxygen atom in each solvate

centers : ndarray(int)

List of each center that each solvate belongs to
wet()[source]¶

Creates atoms at the calculated coordinates

Returns:

coords : ndarray

2D array containing coordinates for all atoms in solvate

elements : array

Array containing the element symbols
